title: Get a list of families belong to the category
name: categories___id_slug__families

Parameter.description: The id of the Category to receive all families belong to it (Optional)
Page number. If you send -1 it will return all results

Success 200.description: Category count of Families belong to it

title: Get a family with all the products
name: families

Success 200.description: Category Parent. If this is not present if because it a first level
Category count of Families belong to it
Families related. They have the same information except related, bonus_images and products fields
List of bonus images. Each array have [url, width, height, is_intermediate]
Url to download the drawing of the product

title: Get a Category with all category children
name: categories_with_child

Success 200.description: List of children categories with the same fields
Url to download the drawing of the product
Category Parent. If this is not present if because it a first level
Category count of Families belong to it
Families related. They have the same information except related, bonus_images and products fields
List of bonus images. Each array have [url, width, height, is_intermediate]
List of other product related as accessory. Have the same fields

title: generate pdf
name: products_pdf
description: This endpoint generate the pdf for the product. The first time it is called from the product details page it generate the file and open in the navigator

Parameter.description: A nonce autogenerate from the Product entity to ensure this endpoint not use in other places

examples.title: Error-Invalids Product:

Fields Mandatory in the json body.description: Product Id for Quote Detail. Related Error 60006
Product Quantity for Quote Detail. Related Error 60006

Error 4xx.description:
The number represent the different kind of errors. Like next:

  • 60001 Invalid Json string or Empty body
  • 60002 Invalid Company Name
  • 60003 Invalid empty First Name or Email
  • 60004 Invalid Email format
  • 60005 Invalid Details Items
  • 60006 Invalid Details Items ID or Quantity

Parameter.description: Page number. If you send -1 it will return all results

Success 200.description: Determine if the resource is a grid pad

Parameter.description: Optional. List of families to get from the server. This parameter take precedent over query.
